text: Maredudd ap Tudur (died around. 1406) was a Welsh soldier and nobleman from the Tudor family of Penmynydd. He was one of five sons of Tudur ap Goronwy, and was the father of Owen Tudor. Maredudd supported the Welsh patriot Owain Glynd≈µr in 1400. He was the great-grandfather of Henry VII of England, the founder of the Tudor dynasty. Category:Welsh people Category:British nobility
title: Maredudd ap Tudur
